vote.title: Authorize a two-year construction services contract, with three one-year renewal options, to perform job order contracting services for environmental remediation at City of Dallas buildings with Prism Response LLC, dba Alloy Group, and RNDI Companies, Inc., the most advantageous proposers of three - Not to exceed $15,000,000.00 - Financing:  General Fund ($5,000,000.00) and Capital Construction Fund ($10,000,000.00)
vote.description: Authorize a two-year construction services contract, with three one-year renewal options, to perform job order contracting services for environmental remediation at City of Dallas buildings with Prism Response LLC, dba Alloy Group, and RNDI Companies, Inc., the most advantageous proposers of three - Not to exceed $15,000,000.00 - Financing:  General Fund ($5,000,000.00) and Capital Construction Fund ($10,000,000.00)
